Game Resources¶

Now that you’re connected, there are a number of systems that you may need to interact with during the game. You’ll primarily be interacting with the systems below.

Note

Credentials will be provided to each team at game start.

Scoreboard¶

Missions, flag submissions, etc are all done through the scoreboard: http://10.10.0.20 Pre-determined credentials will be provided to each team on a printed page. Guard your credentials!

Team Resources¶

Each team will be given access to an F5 BIG-IP that provides connectivity to a poorly written but highly profitable application. Use the F5 BIG-IP to ensure the application is protected from the Biff Tannen hacking brigade.

Team Name Team BIG-IP Application
Clocktower https://10.1.10.10/ http://10.1.10.60/
Flux Cap https://10.2.10.10/ http://10.2.10.60/
Hill Valley https://10.3.10.10/ http://10.3.10.60/
Lyon Estate https://10.4.10.10/ http://10.4.10.60/
Delorian https://10.5.10.10/ http://10.5.10.60/
Plutonium https://10.6.10.10/ http://10.6.10.60/
Lyon Estate https://10.7.10.10/ http://10.7.10.60/
1.21 Gigawatts https://10.8.10.10/ http://10.8.10.60/
